posts.title: Latest Famous Hardware Co. Exhibition Features Local Fashion Designers
posts.content:
The newest art installation behind the windows of the Famous Hardware building in Downtown Springdale is ready for you to view.

  • A look at Fashion Week: The installation is the first of the year and features clothing that was presented in the 2022 Northwest Arkansas Fashion Week. Aptly named “After the Runway,” the storefront exhibition pulls looks from both local and international designers. 
  • For the community: After the Runway can be seen from the sidewalk in front of the Famous Hardware building 24/7 at 113 and 115 West Emma Ave. through mid-May with each installation piece explained in English, Spanish, and Marshallese. 

Learn more HERE.

posts.title: Jazz Master To Perform At The Momentary Tonight
posts.content:
A master and definer of jazz will be performing with students, faculty, and the University of Arkansas Jazz Orchestra tonight at the Momentary. 

  • Collab: David Liebman and the U of A music department are going to turn the Momentary into the best jazz club in NWA tonight, as Liebman is a Grammy-nominated National Endowment for the Arts Jazz Master and has been named one of “the most important saxophonists in contemporary music” by Downbeat Magazine.
  • City lights: Enjoy a classic, jazzy night out tonight at the Momentary, visit the RODE Bar, and jump on your chance to see a master at work. Doors open at 7p and tickets are $30 ($24/members, $10/students). 

For more information, click HERE.

posts.title: New Shop Opens Its Doors On Emma Ave
posts.content:
This is for you, young parents - there’s a new shop on Emma Ave in Springdale called The Babe Co.

  • Children’s shop: The Babe Co. is “Mama Owned” and “Babe Inspired.” The company sells all things babies and kids from clothes to accessories and toys. There are even customizable options for the clothing and accessories!
  • By a mama, for mamas: The founder and owner of The Babe Co. is a single mom who strives to create lasting quality items to share with moms all over the world. Check out the new place and the latest spring-themed merchandise for your little ones in store today.

For more about The Babe Co., click HERE.

posts.title: Bentonville Farmers Market Returns April 9
posts.content:
The Bentonville Farmers Market is set to return to Downtown Bentonville on Saturday, April 9. The weekend markets will run every Saturday from 7:30a to 1p through the end of October.

  • Peak performance: The swiftly-growing Saturday market hit a record-breaking $1,289,955 in sales last year and is poised for additional growth this season.
  • On the horizon: Throughout the 2022 market season, visitors can expect to see an array of farmers and vendors offering fresh local fruits, vegetables, meats, cheeses, arts, and crafts. Additionally, visitors can expect to see farmers market takeovers and unique pop-up events.

Learn more about the 2022 season and what to expect this Saturday HERE.

pick.content:
